name: MeeraTutor
0:
”Alexa, ask Meera Tutor to teach me numbers”
”Alexa, ask Meera Tutor to teach me alphabets”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meera tutor
des: Kids can ask Meera Tutor app to teach them number, alphabets in different languages. Currently starting with English. will add more languages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
